message.raw:
This code reliably timesout quickly and throws an exception, halting the worker,
if no trigger pulse arrives. However, if there has been an abort, the abort is successful
but on a subsequent run with a trigger fail something goes wrong with the syncronisation
acquisition_done and a trigger-fail leads to it continuing to write the data to the HDF5 file.
